text: The East Lancs European was a single-decker body of a bus. It had a step entrance, It was built from 1995 to 1996 by East Lancashire Coachbuilders. The European body was built on the Scania L113CRL chassis. In 1996, the European was replaced by the East Lancs Flyte. ==Gallery== File:Arriva The Shires 3144 N694 EUR.JPG|Scania L113CRL with European bodywork in 2009 File:Arriva bus 281 Scania L113CRL East Lancs European N281 NCN Northumbria Express livery in Newcastle 9 May 2009 pic 2.jpg|Scania L113CRL with European bodywork in 2009 ==References== ==Other websites== * European Category:Step-entrance buses
title: East Lancs European
